title: DDI data repository schema
description: JSON-schema representing a data repository in the DDI model. A repository or catalog of dataset

name.description: the name of the data repository

type.description: a descriptor (ideally from a controlled vocabulary) providing information about the nature of the datasets

license.description: a property used to specify to the terms of use of the standard

version.description: an optional property used to specify a release point for the repository when applicable

creator.description: a property used to specify the person(s) or organization(s) responsible for the repository
